title: 1.CYB.1
text: The student will demonstrate safe and responsible use of computing technologies.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Describe safe and responsible uses of computing technologies based on the school rules and acceptable use policy (AUP).
Demonstrate safe and responsible behaviors when using computing technologies and online communication.
Discuss the process for reporting inappropriate technology use at school or home.
Classify appropriate and inappropriate uses of technology at school or at home.
Explain the consequences of inappropriate uses of computing technologies.
